title: Understanding the Question
text: Take a moment to identify what information is provided and what you're asked to find. What are the conditions you need to use to calculate density at STP?

title: Density Formula Recall
text: Recall that density is mass divided by volume. Here, you're asked to find the density in grams per liter. What do you need to compute this?

title: Volume Correction
text: You're given a volume of the gas at a certain temperature and pressure. To find the volume at STP, what adjustments do you have to make?

title: Ideal Gas Law Association
text: Consider using $$PV=nRT$$ for converting given conditions to STP. How might you use this to adjust the provided volume?
